title: The First Great War
description: ***Series has been republished as The Shadow Army Trilogy***In war, it can be hard to tell your enemies from your allies.Death is ravaging the countryside. To protect his family and his people, Balgar is willing to do anything to stop the invaders wreaking havoc in their lands. His allies think they can negotiate a treaty with the bloodthirsty Celts, but Balgar knows better, and he will do what needs to be done, even if his own friends refuse to see the truth. But tragedy is lurking around the corner—and all the magic in the world can’t stop it.In this prequel to the highly acclaimed Tréaltha Series, M.A. Nichols takes us back to the origin story of the Drogue and the lost souls trapped inside.
author: M.A. Nichols
